document.docTitle: Enithares martini subsp. martini martini Kirkaldy 1898
document.masterDocTitle: Notes on Notonectidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) from southeastern Asia, mostly from Brunei and the Philippines

Distribution. The nominotypical subspecies occurs probably throughout the Philippine Islands except in the Palawan Region and in Mindoro. It has been recorded from numerous islands and provinces ( NIESER & ZETTEL 1999 , ZETTEL 2003). Here are first records from the islands of Poro (Camotes group), Bohol and Siquijor ; and from the provinces Ilocos Norte , Ilocos Sur , La Union , Nueva Viscaya, Cavite (all on Luzon island), and Southern Leyte .
